name: redux-vcr
description: A Redux tool that records user sessions and allows them to be replayed. For debugging, QA, insights, and fun.

scripts.buildCapture: cd capture && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.buildPersist: cd persist && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.buildRetrieve: cd retrieve && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.buildReplay: cd replay && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.buildShared: cd shared && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.buildAll: npm run buildCapture && npm run buildPersist && npm run buildRetrieve && npm run buildReplay && npm run buildShared

author: Joshua Comeau
